participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, Alex loves to explore new ideas and perspectives.
participant_1.background: Originally from a small town, Alex moved to the city to pursue a career in the arts.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Analytical and thoughtful, Jordan enjoys deep conversations and is always ready to lend an ear.
participant_2.background: With a background in psychology, Jordan often finds himself helping friends navigate their feelings.
